-> Airborne Oxygen Instrument [AO2](https://www.eol.ucar.edu/instruments/airborne-oxygen-instrument) -- providing these variables in some project archives:  
\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ **AO2O2:** Concentration of atmospheric oxygen relative to atmospheric nitrogen.  
\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ Units: per meg deviation from a reference value.  
\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ **AO2CO2:** Concentration of atmospheric carbon dioxide as mole fraction in dry air in ppm.  
-> NCAR/Scripps Airborne Flask Sampler [Medusa](https://www.eol.ucar.edu/instruments/ncar-scripps-airborne-flask-sampler)
